key_themes: Macro stimulus and fiscal support dynamics
AI sector momentum and healthcare partnerships
Options expiration mechanics and volatility positioning
risk_factors: Largest short volatility position since June 2024 into options expiration
Household debt at 30% of disposable income - highest since 2008
Banking sector margin compression and capital stress under Fed supervision
Mega-cap technical breakdown patterns (TSLA, PLTR, AAPL downtrends)
Regulatory enforcement actions and security vulnerabilities in crypto/tech sectors
